mapper.select: SELECT e.*, a.*, c.*, w.WORKINGHOUR_WT, w.WORKINGHOUR_LT--, ap.APPROVAL_TT FROM EMPLOYEE e LEFT OUTER JOIN ANNUAL a ON e.EMPLOYEE_CD = a.EMPLOYEE_CD AND ANNUAL_YR = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') LEFT JOIN COMMON_CODE c ON e.EMPLOYEE_DP = c.COMMON_CC AND c.COMMON_GC = 'DEPARTMENT' LEFT JOIN WORKINGHOUR w ON e.WORKINGHOUR_ID = w.WORKINGHOUR_ID WHERE e.EMPLOYEE_CD = #{currentCd}
